If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 29 #include "../processing_unit_interface.h" 30 42 class ImgTruncator : public ProcessingUnitInterface { 43 public: 44 // ImgTruncator constructor 45 ImgTruncator(); 46 47 // ImgTruncator destructor 48 ~ImgTruncator(); 49 50 // Doesn't realize anything 51 void Start() override; 52 53 // Modified the data 54 void Run(void *) override; 55 56 // Deletes the extra allocated memory 57 void Delete() override; 58 59 // Creates a clone of itself 60 ProcessingUnitInterface *Clone() override; 61 };
